short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check if LeFrenchStallion is in Live on Twitch. And notify the user.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This application Check for you if LeFrenchStallion is in Live on Twitch or when the Live End. It's check's every minutes by default but this can be change in the Option of the Extension.
